org.jacpfx.api.component

Interface Component<L,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - defines the message listener type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Component<L,M>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Perspective<L,A,M>, PerspectiveView<C,L,A,M>, StatelessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, SubComponent<L,A,M>, UIComponent<C,L,A,M>

    public interface Component<L,M>
extends java.lang.Comparable<Component<L,M>>
    This Interface represents a very basic component that can exists in JACP environment.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JacpContext<L,M> getContext()
      Returns the components context object.
      java.lang.String getLocaleID()
      Represents the Locale ID, see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html.
      java.lang.String getResourceBundleLocation()
      Represents the location of your resource bundle file.
      boolean isStarted()
      Get if component was activated, can occur if message was send before "init" message arrived.

      Set the Locale ID, see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html.

      Set the location of your resource bundle file.
      void setStarted(boolean started)
      Set once when component was first started
